Verses: 1 rooban Puththirarukkum Kaadh Puththirarukkum Aadumaadugal Migavum Thiralaayirundhadhu; Avargal Yaaser Dhesaththaiyum Keeleyaath Dhesaththaiyum Paarththapodhu, Adhu Aadumaadugalukkuth Thagundha Idamendru Kandaargal.
2 aagaiyaal Rooban Puththirarum Kaadh Puththirarum Vandhu, Moseyaiyum Aasaariyanaagiya Eleyaasaaraiyum Sabaiyin Prabukkalaiyum Nokki:

3 karththar Isravel Sabaikku Munbaaga Muriya Adiththa Adharodh, Theepon, Yaaser, Nimraa, Espon, Eleyaale, Sepaam, Nepo, Peyon Ennum Pattanangalai Serndha Naadaanadhu Aadumaadugalukkuth Thagundha Idam.
4 umadhu Adiyaarukku Aadumaadugal Undu.
5 ummudaiya Kangalil Engalukkuth Thayai Kidaiththadhaanaal, Engalai Yordhaan Nadhikku Appuram Kadandhupogappanneeraaga; Indha Naattai Umadhu Adiyaarukkuk Kaaniyaatchiyaagak Kodukkavendum Endraargal.
6 appozhudhu Mose Kaadh Puththiraraiyum Rooban Puththiraraiyum Nokki: Ungal Sagodharar Yuththaththirkup Pogaiyil, Neengal Inge Iruppeergalo?
7 karththar Isravel Puththirarukkuk Koduththa Dhesaththirku Avargal Pogaadhapadikku, Neengal Avargal Irudhayaththaith Thidanatruppogappannugiradhenna?
8 andha Dhesaththaip Paarppadharku Naan Ungal Pidhaakkalaik Kaadhesparneyaavilirundhu Anuppinapodhu Avargalum Ippadiye Seydhaargal.

9 avargal Eskol Pallaththaakkumattum Poi, Aththesaththaip Paarththuvandhu, Isravel Puththirar Karththar Thangalukkuk Koduththa Dhesaththirkup Pogaadhapadikku Avargal Irudhayaththaith Thidanatruppogappanninaargal.
10 adhinaal Karththar Annaalile Kobam Moondavaraagi:
11 uththamamaai Ennaip Pinpatrina Kenesiyanaana Eppunneyin Kumaaran Kaalepum, Noonin Kumaaran Yosuvaavum Thavira,

12 egipthilirundhu Vandhavargalil Irubadhu Vayadhumudhal Adharku Merpattamanidhargalil Oruvarum Ennai Uththamamaaip Pinpatraadhapadiyaal, Avargal Naan Aabirakaamukkum Eesaakkukkum Yaakkobukkum Aanaiyittukkoduththa Dhesaththaik Kaanbadhillai Endru Aanaiyittirukkiraar.

13 appadiye Karththarudaiya Kobam Isravelinmel Moondadhu; Karththarudaiyasamugaththil Pollaappu Seydha Andha Sandhadhiyellaam Nirmoolamaagumattum Avargalai Vanaandharaththile Naarpadhu Varusham Alaiyappanninaar.

14 ippozhudhum Idho Isravelarmelirukkum Karththarudaiya Kobaththin Ukkiraththai Innum Adhigarikkappannumpadi, Neengal Ungal Pidhaakkalin Sthaanaththile Paavamulla Perunkoottamaai Ezhumbiyirukkireergal.
15 neengal Avaraivittup Pinvaanginaal, Avar Innum Avargalai Vanaandharaththil Irukkappannuvaar; Ippadi Neengal Indha Janangalaiyellaam Azhiyappannuveergal Endraan.
16 appozhudhu Avargal Avan Sameebaththil Vandhu: Engal Aadumaadugalukkaagath Thozhuvangalaiyum, Engal Pillaigalukkaagap Pattanangalaiyum Inge Kattuvom.

17 naangalo Isravel Puththirarai Avargal Sthaanaththile Kondupoi Serkkumalavum, Yuththasannaththaaraith Theeviraththode Avargalukku Munbaaga Nadappom; Engal Pillaigal Iththesaththuk Kudigalinimiththam Aranaana Pattanangalile Kudiyirukkak Kettukkollugirom.
18 isravel Puththirar Yaavarum Thangal Thangal Sudhandharaththai Sudhandhariththuk Kollumvaraikkum, Naangal Engal Veedugalukkuth Thirumbuvadhillai.
19 yordhaanukku Ippuraththil Kizhakke Engalukku Sudhandharam Undaanapadiyinaale, Naangal Avargalodekooda Yordhaanukku Akkaraiyilum, Adharku Appuraththilum Sudhandharam Vaangamaattom Endraargal.
20 appozhudhu Mose Avargalai Nokki: Neengal Indha Vaarththaiyinpadiye Seydhu,karththarudaiya Samugaththil Yuththasannaththaraagi,

21 karththar Thammudaiya Saththurukkalaith Thammudaiya Mugaththirku Munnindru Thuraththividumalavum, Neengal Yaavarum Avarudaiya Samugaththil Yuththasannaththaraai Yordhaanaik Kadandhupoveergalaanaal,

22 aththesam Karththarukku Munbaaga Vasappaduththappattapinbu Neengal Thirumbivandhu,karththarukku Munbaagavum, Isravelarukku Munbaagavum, Kutramillaadhiruppeergal; Adharkuppinbu Indha Dhesam Karththarukku Munbaaga Ungalukku Sudhandharamaagum.
23 neengal Ippadi Seyyaamarponaal, Karththarukku Virodhamaagap Paavam Seydhavargalaayiruppeergal; Ungal Paavam Ungalaith Thodarndhupidikkum Endru Nichchayamaai Ariyungal.
24 ungal Pillaigalukkaagap Pattanangalaiyum, Ungal Aadumaadugalukkaagath Thozhuvangalaiyum Katti, Ungal Vaaimozhiyinpadiye Seyyungal Endraan.
25 appozhudhu Kaadh Puththirarum Rooban Puththirarum Moseyai Nokki: Engal Aandavan Kattalaiyittapadiye Umadhu Oozhiyakkaararaagiya Naangal Seyvom.
26 engal Pillaigalaiyum Engal Manaivigalum, Engal Aadumaadu Mudhalaana Engaludaiya Ellaa Mirugajeevangalodum Inge Keeleyaaththin Pattanangalil Iruppaargal.
27 umadhu Oozhiyakkaararaagiya Naangalo Engal Aandavan Sonnapadiye, Ovvoruvarum Yuththasannaththaraai, Karththarudaiya Samugaththil Yuththaththirkup Povom Endraargal.
28 appozhudhu Mose Avargalukkaaga Aasaariyanaagiya Eleyaasaarukkum, Noonin Kumaaranaagiya Yosuvaavukkum, Isravel Puththirarudaiya Koththira Pidhaakkalaagiya Thalaivargalukkum Kattalaiyittu:

29 kaadh Puththirarum Rooban Puththirarum Avaravar Karththarudaiya Samugaththil Yuththasannaththaaraai Ungalodekooda Yordhaanaik Kadandhuponaal, Aththesam Ungalukku Vasappattapinbu, Avargalukkuk Keeleyaath Dhesaththai Sudhandharamaagak Kodukkakkadaveergal.
30 ungalodekooda Yuththasannaththaraaik Kadandhupogaadhirundhaargaleyaanaal, Avargal Ungal Naduve Kaanaan Dhesaththile Sudhandharam Adaiyakkadavargal Endraan.
31 kaadh Puththirarum Rooban Puththirarum Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Ummudaiya Oozhiyakkaararaagiya Naangal Karththar Engalukku Sonnapadiye Seyvom.
32 yordhaanukku Ikkaraiyile Engal Sudhandharaththin Kaaniyaatchi Engalukku Uriyadhaagumpadi Naangal Karththarudaiya Samugaththil Yuththasannaththaaraaik Kaanaandhesaththirkup Povom Endraargal.

33 appozhudhu Mose Kaadh Puththirarukkum, Rooban Puththirarukkum, Yoseppin Kumaaranaagiya Manaaseyin Paadhik Koththiraththaarukkum, Emoriyarudaiya Raajaavaagiya Seekonin Raajyaththaiyum, Paasaanudaiya Raajaavaagiya Ogin Raajyaththaiyum, Avaigalai Serndha Dhesangalaiyum Avaigalin Ellaiyai Sutrilumulla Pattanangalaiyum Koduththaan.
34 pinbu Kaadh Sandhadhiyaar Theepon, Adharodh Aarover,
35 aadhrodh, Sopaan, Yaaser, Yogipeyaa,
36 pedhnimraa, Peththaaran Ennum Aranaana Pattanangalaiyum Aattuththozhuvangalaiyum Kattinaargal.
37 rooban Sandhadhiyaar Espon, Eleyaale, Keeriyaththaayeem,
38 pergal Maatrappatta Nepo, Paagaalmeyon, Seepmaa Enbavaigalaik Katti, Thaangal Kattina Pattanangalukku Vere Pergalaik Koduththaargal.
39 manaaseyin Kumaaranaagiya Maakeerin Puththirar Keeleyaaththirkup Poi, Adhaik Kattikkondu, Adhilirundha Emoriyaraith Thuraththivittaargal.
40 appozhudhu Mose Keeleyaaththai Manaaseyin Kumaaranaagiya Maakeerukkuk Koduththaan; Avargal Adhile Kudiyerinaargal.
41 manaaseyin Kumaaranaagiya Yaaveer Poi, Avargaludaiya Graamangalaik Kattikkondu, Avaigalukku Yaaveer Endru Perittaan.
42 nopaak Poi, Kenaaththaiyum Adhin Graamangalaiyum Kattikkondu, Adharkuth Than Naamaththinpadiye Nopaak Endru Perittaan.
